name: Dire Bat
flavor: A winged pet endlessly loyal to their vampire owner.

features.name: Flying - Passive
features.desc: While flying, the Bat gains a +3 bonus to their Difficulty.

features.name: Screech - Action
features.desc: Mark a Stress to send a high-pitch screech out toward all targets in front of the Bat within Far range. Those targets must mark 1d4 Stress.

features.name: Guardian - Reaction
features.desc: When an allied Vampire marks HP, you can mark a Stress to fly into Melee range of the attacker and make an attack with advantage against them. On a success, deal 2d6+2 physical damage.
